author: COMSOL
description: This is a tutorial example showing how to model piezoelectric devices using the layered shell functionality. Two cases of material orientation are studied. In the first case, the pole axis is normal to the shell surface, which results in a thickness change. In the second case, the pole axis is in the plane of the shell, which leads to bending.
label: piezoelectric_layered.mph
name: root
